headline: BNY Announces Redemption of Floating Rate Senior Notes Due 2025
summary: The Bank of New York Mellon Corporation ("BNY") (NYSE: BK), a global financial services company, today announced that it will redeem all of the issued and outstanding Floating Rate Senior Notes due April 25, 2025 (CUSIP 06406RBE6) (the "Notes"). The Notes have an aggregate principal amount of $400,000,000.
